text: Ukanti uAllâh Unenzele imithunzi ngoko Akudalileyo, Wanenzela neendawo zokufumana ukhuseleko ezintabeni, Wanenzela nezambatho zokunikhusela ebushushwini (nasengqeleni) nezinxibo zentsimbi zokunikhusela kuhlaselwano lwenu. Uzifezekise kanjalo ke izibabalo zaKhe kuni, khon’ukuze nizinikele eNtandweni yaKhe (i-Islam)
